Configuration.Name: ALMA_NCIP_BORROWING_RENEWAL_V2
Configuration.Author: Bill Jones, SUNY Geneseo and Tim Jackson, SUNY SLSS
Configuration.Description: This Server addon allows ILLiad to renew items in Alma via NCIP protocol using Barcodes.

Setting.name: FieldToUseForBarcode
Setting.Description: This setting determines what field you use to get the barcode from the ILLiad TN to send to Alma. If blank, the Addon will use the TransactionNumber field.

Setting.name: NCIP_Responder_URL
Setting.Description: This setting value is the address for the NCIP Responder URL. It is your Alma server,i.e., na01.alma.exlibrisgroup.com/view/NCIPServlet, na02.alma.exlibrisgroup.com/view/NCIPServlet.

Setting.name: renewItem_from_uniqueAgency_value
Setting.Description: This is your institutional Alma Code.

Setting.name: ApplicationProfileType
Setting.Description: Input the Resource Sharing Partner code used in Alma.

Setting.name: RenewItemSearchQueue
Setting.Description: The queue the addon will monitor to process requests.

Setting.name: RenewItemSuccessQueue
Setting.Description: This designates the name of the queue a Borrowing Transaction will be moved to if the RenewItem function is successful.

Setting.name: RenewItemFailQueue
Setting.Description: This designates the name of the queue a Borrowing Transaction will be moved to if the RenewItem function fails.
